title: The Borrowers 1973 (Fantasy film) Big Secrets, Tiny Family —Hidden Worlds Revealed!

sources.title: The Borrowers 1973 (Fantasy film) Big Secrets, Tiny Family —Hidden Worlds Revealed!
sources.description:
A family of tiny people—Pod, Homily, and Arrietty Clock—live beneath the floorboards of a Victorian country home, sneaking through the big house “borrowing” what they need. When the Boy spots them and a ferret gets loose, the Clocks must outsmart the humans and make a daring escape.

Original title: The Borrowers (1973)

Director: Walter C. Miller
Based on the novels of Mary Norton.

Main cast:
Eddie Albert - Pod Clock
Tammy Grimes - Homily Clock
Judith Anderson - Aunt Sophy
Beatrice Straight - Mrs. Crampfurl
Barnard Hughes - Mr. Crampfurl
Dennis Larson - The Boy
Karen Pearson - Arrietty Clock
Murray Westgate - Ernie
Dan McIlravey - Tom

Genres: Fantasy, Literary, Adventure, TV Movie
Release date: December 14, 1973 (USA)
Filming location: Ontario, Canada
